name: lyrics-finder
author: Rahil Kabani <rahil.kabani.4@gmail.com>
description: A Simple Lyrics Finder That Just Works!

scripts.releasepatch: npm i && git add . && git commit -m 'update' && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.releaseminor: npm i && git add . && git commit -m 'update' && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.releasemajor: npm i && git add . && git commit -m 'update' && npm version major && git push && npm publish
